phase41_labor_implementation.title: Implementation: Labor Market Major-Matching
phase41_labor_implementation.instruction_raw: Implement the Major-Matching logic in HREngine, Household, and LaborMarket as per MISSION_phase41_labor_design_SPEC.md. Use CanonicalOrderDTO.metadata['major'] for compatibility.

phase41_firm_seo_implementation.title: Implementation: Firm SEO Brain-Scan Readiness
phase41_firm_seo_implementation.instruction_raw: Refactor all Firm Engines to ensure they are pure functions (stateless). Update the Firm orchestrator to handle record_expense and finalize_firing locally. Verify with Brain Scan simulations as per MISSION_phase41_seo_brain_scan_SPEC.md.
